title: Airhead Water Ski Rope with Rubber Handle, 1 Section, 75-Feet
features: 16 - Strand, 1,000-pound break strength rope, single-section water ski rope
Aluminum with rubber comfort grip floating handle has molded end caps for safety and comfort
The 16-strand 75-foot rope is UV-treated and pre-stretched
The 1 section water ski rope is a bright red color that stands out in the water
Includes a rope keeper for easy organization and storage
description: The Rubber Handle Water Ski Rope is a reliable, durable line made to last for years to come. There’s a floating rubber handle that has molded end caps for safety and comfort. The 12-inch grip provides a great handhold for riders of all ages and abilities. You’ll never have to worry about being comfortable when you hold on, and it’ll help you stay on the water for longer. The 16-strand 75-foot rope is UV-treated and pre-stretched. Plus, this 1 section water ski rope is a bright red color that stands out in the water. A Rope Keeper is included for easy organization and storage.
